items.text: Although the weather was terrible, we decided to continue with our outdoor plans.
items.translation_uz: Ob-havo dahshatli bo'lishiga qaramay, biz ochiq havoda rejalarimizni davom ettirishga qaror qildik.

items.text: The research suggests that regular meditation can significantly reduce anxiety levels.
items.translation_uz: Tadqiqotlar muntazam meditatsiya tashvish darajasini sezilarli darajada kamaytirishini ko'rsatadi.

items.text: Despite facing numerous challenges, the team managed to complete the project on time.
items.translation_uz: Ko'plab qiyinchiliklarga duch kelishiga qaramay, jamoa loyihani o'z vaqtida tugatishga muvaffaq bo'ldi.

items.text: The documentary explores how climate change is affecting wildlife populations globally.
items.translation_uz: Hujjatli film iqlim o'zgarishi butun dunyo bo'ylab yovvoyi hayvonlar populyatsiyasiga qanday ta'sir qilayotganini o'rganadi.

items.text: While some experts argue for stricter regulations, others believe in market freedom.
items.translation_uz: Ba'zi ekspertlar qattiqroq tartib-qoidalarni talab qilsa, boshqalari bozor erkinligiga ishonadi.

items.text: The museum exhibition showcases artifacts that date back over three thousand years.
items.translation_uz: Muzey ko'rgazmasi uch ming yildan ortiq tarixga ega artefaktlarni namoyish etadi.

items.text: Having analyzed the data thoroughly, the scientists published their groundbreaking findings.
items.translation_uz: Ma'lumotlarni puxta tahlil qilgandan so'ng, olimlar o'zlarining muhim topilmalarini nashr etdilar.

items.text: The novel brilliantly portrays the social issues that were prevalent in that era.
items.translation_uz: Roman o'sha davrda keng tarqalgan ijtimoiy muammolarni yorqin tasvirlaydi.

items.text: Unless we take immediate action, the environmental damage will become irreversible.
items.translation_uz: Agar zudlik bilan choralar ko'rmasak, atrof-muhitga etkazilgan zarar qaytarilmas bo'lib qoladi.

items.text: The professor explained that the theory had been widely accepted by the scientific community.
items.translation_uz: Professor nazariya ilmiy jamoatchilik tomonidan keng qabul qilinganini tushuntirdi.

items.text: Not only did she win the competition, but she also broke the previous record.
items.translation_uz: U nafaqat musobaqada g'alaba qozondi, balki oldingi rekordni ham yangiladi.

items.text: The economic forecast indicates that growth will slow down in the coming months.
items.translation_uz: Iqtisodiy prognoz kelgusi oylarda o'sish sustlashishini ko'rsatadi.

items.text: By the time we arrived at the station, the last train had already departed.
items.translation_uz: Biz stansiyaga yetib kelganimizda, oxirgi poyezd allaqachon jo'nab ketgan edi.

items.text: The architect designed the building to maximize natural light and energy efficiency.
items.translation_uz: Arxitektor binoni tabiiy yorug'lik va energiya samaradorligini maksimal darajada oshirish uchun loyihaladi.

items.text: Whether you agree with the decision or not, we must respect the final verdict.
items.translation_uz: Qarorga rozi bo'lasizmi yoki yo'qmi, biz yakuniy hukmni hurmat qilishimiz kerak.
